title: Diamond Head State Monument
seo_description: Hawaii’s most iconic landmark is known for its historic hiking trail with stunning views of the Pacific and Oahu’s south coast.
address: Entrance located on Diamond Head Road, Honolulu
Price: $5 per car; $1 per person for pedestrians. Cash only

contents_1: Hawaii’s most iconic landmark is known for its historic hiking trail with stunning views of the Pacific and Oahu’s south coast.
description: Hawaii’s most iconic landmark is known for its historic hiking trail with stunning views of the Pacific and Oahu’s south coast. The 0.8-mile hike from trailhead to summit offers quite a workout as you gain 560 feet from the crater floor. The trail also offers a glimpse into the crater’s extensive military history.
time: 6am-6pm; Last entrance to the trail at 4:30pm
